Package com.project.capstone.user

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.project.capstone.user.UserController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1") @RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") public class UserController extends Object
The Controller class for the User. Includes all API endpoints.

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      id - The id you would like to delete.
      Returns:

    • updateUsers

      Parameters:
      user - Passing in a user.
      usersId - The users id.
      Returns:
      A response entity ok.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - Thrown when the user is not found.

    • refreshToken

      @GetMapping("/token/refresh") public void refreshToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Get request to refresh the token.
      Parameters:
      request - Http request which includes the refresh token.
      response - Respond with the new tokens.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown when token is invalid or expired.
